#summary The select element represents a menu of mutually exclusive options.
#labels about-html,about-forms,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *select element*

== Usage ==

[SpecificationHTML4 HTML 4] says, "The `select` element creates a menu. Each choice offered by the menu is represented by an [OptionElement option] element."
